description:
Diego is one of those guys that everyone loves to be around. He's always smiling and laughing and it's contagious to those around him. When you're with Diego you have no choice but to be in a good mood. He and I have been hanging out a lot lately and getting to know each other. He's a wild one and he loves a party.

Tonight we get up close and personal with Diego in the War Chest Update. He lays it all on the line and reveals some intimate secrets. I'm not going to spoil it for you, you'll have to watch the War Chest Update to find out exactly what secrets he tells, but I can assure you that we've already made a few of his shared fantasies come true. He's crossed the line and has already done three hardcore scenes for us and everything he mentions in the War Chest comes true and then some in his hardcore scenes. This one is a wild child and I'm sure you'll come away from his War Chest scene anticipating his first hardcore release.

Diego is 21 years old, 5' 9' and 140 lbs., he likes to surf, hang out at the beach, hit the clubs and play beer pong. At the end of his video I ask Diego what type of guy he likes and then I bring Spencer in with his shirt off and he immediately approves. He and Spencer shoot the shit for a minute and things are to be 'continued'..
title: Diego
